changes.title: Data
details: Added - V2.3 until day 2021/02/27.

changes.title: Database
details: Added Filter: Cost.
Added Card Search: Card Code.
Miscellaneous: There will now be a link to the League of Legends Wiki for each card.
Miscellaneous: Reduce the size of the filter part.
Bugfixed: Now arrange associated cards in their correct order, eg T10 will be after T9.
